titleInfo.title: Begun in 1903. Hill Memorial Library building. Louisiana State University

mods.abstract: Hill Memorial Library exterior view from the northwest Handwritten on back- Begun in 1903.; Typed on back- Hill memorial Library building. Louisiana State University.; The funding for Hill Memorial Library was provided to the University by Mr. John Hill of West Baton Rouge Parish, as a memorial to his son, John Hill Jr.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
mods.note: LSU Photograph Collection, 1886-1926, Louisiana State University Archives, LSU Libraries, Baton Rouge, LA.
